dict.string: This app wants to access your calendars
This app needs your permission to write events to your calendars. This includes creating events, but not reading, modifying or deleting events.
This app needs your permission to fully manage events on your calendars. This includes reading, writing, modifying and deleting events.
This app needs your location to associate with your tasks and projects
This app needs your location to associate with your tasks and projects
The Telepathic app wants to use your microphone to record audio.
This app needs your permission to recognize speech for voice-to-text transcription.
This app needs access to your camera to capture photos for creating tasks.
This app needs access to your photo library to select photos for creating tasks.
This app needs access to your heart rate and step count to display health information on the sensors page.
This app needs access to update your health data.
